name: BZ Web Solutions
body:
#We build the right thing with the right team, methods and tools.

###Marketing, education, work, inspiration, fun. 
We believe that by developing an awesome app, it will be the first step for standing out. This goes for the design and UX as well as how well the app solves a problem for the user e.g. being entertaining, useful or providing relevant content. As the user's expertise in apps grows, they also expect more from the apps they use and compare them to existing, well-established ones. Enterprise apps will also benefit from being awesome in order to stand out and make a strong connection with the user. If you have an idea for a mobile game and are looking forward to get it developed from a reliable custom mobile game development company, Contact us.

### Authors and Contributors
Boris Zarco (Project Founder)

### Support or Contact
If you want to contact us you can use this handy form Google, we will reply as soon as possible.
CONTACT FORM: 
https://goo.gl/forms/6JDpsWmnzyOADCDP2

### Other Project
Grey Blind Production: https://vimeo.com/greyblind **Mail**: greyblindstudio@gmail.com
Where is Internet: http://whereisinternet.com **Mail**: info@whereisinternet.com
